name: BuildaSnowman
0:
”Alexa, build a snowman”
”Alexa, ask build a snowman to show my last snowman”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: build a snowman
des:
With Build a Snowman, you can build hundreds of cute and unique snowmen and save them for later. They'll always be happy to see you, and they'll never melt.

You don't need snow, you don't need winter–all you need to build a snowman is Alexa. Make sure to open up your Alexa app or look at your Echo Show to see your creations.

Please leave a rating, too!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
